text.tspan: [-n|--non-interactive] # if you already know the 3 answers, use -n to skip interaction
[-d|--download] # yes, download /tmp/pkg.tgz pkg.tgz if not exists.
[-m|--mode <config_mode>] # designate config template to use: demo, demo4, pg14, tiny, oltp
[-i|--ip <primary_ip>] # tell pigsty the primary ip address of current node
Get pigsty with three lines of code
Primary IPv4 address of your node
(Use the IP you can connect. DO NOT USE Public Internet IP)
Y: Download offline pkg.tgz from Github
N: Download from upstream during install
port to view Pigsty Home Page
# it better accessing via domain names: http://g.pigsty
